name: Bunker - The Underground Game
description: This is Bunker: The Underground Game. You probably never heard of it but since you now have, you are one of the cool kids. Game takes place deep down in a forgotten Soviet bunker. You spend rest of your absurd adventure puzzling, mini gaming, pointing, clicking, hipstering, err humor-ing oh and escaping what is no doubt the weirdest...

reviews.review_text: Bunker - The Underground Game  is one of many Point & Click games and I was certainly excited when I first saw it. I was not disappointed, despite some events that stopped the gameplay flow. If this review is too long for you, I suggest you to only read the first paragraph about the game's content and the final verdict at the end.   What is happening in the game:
Fun little game that delivers what it promises. Funny moments at least for me. The puzzles required some thinking but were not too hard. I played it through in 4 hours of madness.
